text: aur jab unake paas shaanti ya bhay kee koee soochana aatee hai, to use phaila dete hain. jabaki yadi ve use allaah ke rasool tatha apane adhikaariyon kee or pher dete, to jo baat kee tah tak pahunchane vaale hain, ve usakee vaastavikta jaan lete. yadi tumapar allaah kee anukampa tatha daya na hotee, to tumamen thode ke siva sab shaitaan ke peechhe bhaag[1] jaate
